greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of A049820(x) = x - A000005(x) needed to reach an odd number or zero, when starting from x = n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..110880
formula: a(0) = 0; for n >= 1, for n odd, a(n) = 0, and for n even, a(n) = 1 + a(n-A000005(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
